# Run SIR models

Load libraries.

```{r}
library(igraph)
library(data.table)

library(ggplot2)
library(ggraph)
library(patchwork)
```

## Prepare parameters

```{r}
beta = c(seq(1, 5, 1))
gamma = c(seq(1, 5, 1))
```

## Load networks

```{r}
load("data/results/data_networks.Rds")
networks_spillover = data_ntwk[[1]]
n1 = networks_spillover[[6]]
n2 = networks_spillover[[7]]
```

## SIR models

```{r}
models = lapply(
  list(n1, n2), igraph::sir, beta = 5, gamma = 1
)
models = lapply(models, handle_sir_data)
```

```{r}
sirplots = lapply(models, function(df) {
  ggplot(df)+
    stat_summary(
      aes(time, mean, colour = class, shape = class),
      alpha = 1
    )+
    scale_colour_manual(
      values = c(
        "NS" = "orange",
        "NI" = "indianred",
        "NR" = "steelblue"
      )
    )+
    scale_x_sqrt()+
    coord_cartesian(
      xlim = c(0, 15),
      ylim = c(0, 500)
    )
})

sirplots = wrap_plots(sirplots, guides = "collect", ncol = 2)
```


## Make plots

```{r}
networkplots = lapply(
  list(n1, n2), function(n) {
    ggraph(n, x = x, y = y)+
      geom_edge_fan(
        edge_width = 0.2,
        edge_alpha = 0.1
      )+
      geom_node_point(
        aes(fill = t_infec, shape = social_strat,
            size = assoc),
        size = 3,
        alpha = 1,
        show.legend = F
      )+
      scale_shape_manual(
        values = c(21, 22, 23, 24)
      )+
      scale_fill_viridis_c(
        option = "A",
        limit = c(1, NA),
        na.value = "lightblue"
        # trans = "sqrt"
      )+
      theme(
        legend.position = "top"
      )
  })

networkplots = wrap_plots(networkplots, ncol = 2)
```

```{r}
fig = wrap_plots(
  networkplots,
  sirplots,
  guides = "collect",
  ncol=1
) &
  theme(
    legend.position = "top"
  )
  
ggsave(
  fig,
  filename = "figures/fig_sir.png"
)
```
